name: Stay Woke
description:
You wake up in a lab and are chased by monsters. The only weapons at your disposal are canned drinks. Your sole objective is to stay woke.

Created for the Probably Jam. 

Currently at the demo phase.

WASD move the player. Mouse to steer. Left and right click throw left and right cans. Q and E drink the can that is held. Only empty cans can be thrown. Monsters can be temporarily halted by throwing cans at them.

3d models, texturing, animation: kyan

Programming: sandalphon

Title art, can parody brand designs and ui: minyan
